address.deliveryPoint: Dipartimento di Biologia, Università di Pisa, via Derna 1, I-56126 Pisa, Italy

abstract.para: The databases stores historical and current plant occurrence records relative to Tuscany administrative region of Italy (NUTS-2 code ITE1). Source of records may be bibliographical references, herbarium specimens, or human observations. The database is associated with the Wikiplantbase project, including sister databases for Sardinia, Liguria and Sicily
